alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Santa Monica Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 15 at 3:45PM PST until November 16 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with damaging gusts up to 65 mph expected. Strongest winds in the valleys and Santa Monicas. Isolated gusts up to 75 mph possible across the western Santa Monicas. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Malibu Coast, Santa Monica Mountains and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Malibu Coast; Santa Monica Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
